p: Specifically, 91% of the excess mortality registered at the average national level in March 2020 is concentrated in the areas of high spread of the epidemic: 37 northern provinces plus Pesaro and Urbino. In all of these provinces, deaths from all causes have more than doubled compared to the 2015â€“2019 average for the month of March. If we consider the period from February 20 to March 31, 52% are deaths reported by the COVID-19 ISS (Italian National Institute of Health (ISS) 2020)
